name: Course on Physics for INPHO Foundation & JEE Advanced 2023
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of Physics. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for Olympiads (NSEP, INPHO) and JEE Advance 2023. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Uniform & Non-Uniform Circular Motion and General Plane Motion
Conical Pendulum, Relative Angular Velocity, and Problem Solving
Circular Motion of Particles on Rough and Smooth Surface with FBD
Compound Pendulum, Centripetal & Centrifugal Force and Problem Solving
Kinematics of Circular Motion - Part IV
Vertical Circular Motion, Tension vs Cos Ө Graph and Minimum Velocity
Vertical Circular Motion and Minimum Velocity: Problem Solving
Doubt Clearing Session
Work: Calculation of Force and Work Done by Constant Force
Work Done by Variable Force & Frictional Force and their Derivations
Work Done by Variable Force, its Different Cases & Derivations
Work Done by Central Force & Problem Solving
Work-Energy Theorem and Work Done In Pulling the Chain
Kinetic Energy of Non-Uniform Disc, Uniform & Non-Uniform Rod
Work Done by Spring Force, Conservative Forces, and Polar-Coordinates
Variable Force: Magical Force and Non- Conservative Force
Mechanical Energy: Gravitational Function & Discontinuity Potential Function
Conservative and Non-Conservative Force: Types of Equilibrium
Conservative and Non- Conservative Force: Saddle Point
Doubt Clearing Session
Kinetic Enery and Potential Energy
Vertical Circular Motion - Part I
Vertical Circular Motion - Part II
Concept of Power
Doubt Clearing Session
Concept of Equilibrium & Doubt Clearing Session
